revision.text: {{Article history| action1 = GAN | action1date = 22:58, 8 May 2009 | action1link = Talk:Battle of Lalakaon/GA1 | action1result = listed | action1oldid = 288656142 | action2 = WAR | action2date = 07:21, 19 January 2013 (UTC) | action2link = Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Battle of Lalakaon | action2result = approved | action2oldid = 533500217 | currentstatus = GA | topic =War | dykdate = 23 March 2009 | dyklink = Wikipedia:Recent additions 242#23 March 2009 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Middle Ages|class=A|importance=Mid}} {{WikiProject Greece|class=A|importance=Mid |B-Class-1= yes |B-Class-2= yes |B-Class-3= yes |B-Class-4= yes |B-Class-5= yes |topic=history|byzantine-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=A|A-Class=pass|Medieval=yes|Muslim=yes|Roman=yes}} }} {{On this day|date1=2011-09-03|oldid1=448152052|date2=2013-09-03|oldid2=571182405|date3=2016-09-03|oldid3=737502710}} {{Talk:Battle of Lalakaon/GA1}} == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Battle of Lalakaon]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=712377393 my edit]. You may add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it, if I keep adding bad data, but formatting bugs should be reported instead. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether, but should be used as a last resort. I made the following changes: *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://www.deremilitari.org/resources/pdfs/huxley.pdf When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 19:14, 28 March 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[Battle of Lalakaon]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=746652078 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120220082451/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7927&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7927&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_1 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120220082451/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7927&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7927&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_2 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120220082451/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7927&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7927&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_3 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20110721081248/http://www.ehw.gr/l.aspx?id=7927 to http://www.ehw.gr/l.aspx?id=7927 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 18:12, 28 October 2016 (UTC)
